bibl.title: The Mummy as Medium. A Provocative New Study Links Roman-Era Faiyum Portraits to Pharaonic Religious Beliefs.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Lorelei H. CORCORAN, Portrait Mummies from Roman Egypt (Chicago, 1995); - Euphrosyne DOXIADIS, The Mysterious Fayum Portraits, Faces from Ancient Egypt (New York, 1995); - Barbara BORG, Mumienporträts (Mainz am Rhein, 1996).
bibl.seg: BIANCHI Robert Steven, The Mummy as Medium. A Provocative New Study Links Roman-Era Faiyum Portraits to Pharaonic Religious Beliefs.
Archaeology 48 (1995) No. 6, pp. 60-66, 2 figg. et 1 pl. coul.

Article compte rendu de: Lorelei H. CORCORAN, Portrait Mummies from Roman Egypt (Chicago, 1995); - Euphrosyne DOXIADIS, The Mysterious Fayum Portraits, Faces from Ancient Egypt (New York, 1995); - Barbara BORG, Mumienporträts (Mainz am Rhein, 1996).
